# Classes
- __.mntl-figure-caption__
Wraps the entire component
- __.figure-article-caption-text__
Wraps the photo caption text, excluding the photo owner
- __.figure-article-caption-owner__
Wraps the photo owner portion of the caption
# Models / Properties
- __caption__
The image's caption
- __owner__
Owner of the image. Displayed under the caption
- __showCaptionIcon__
Determines whether we display the camera icon next to the photo caption
